title: Commissioner's right of action
context: ยง431:13-107 Commissioner&rsquo;s right of action. All remedies, penalties and proceedings set forth in this article are to be invoked solely and exclusively by the commissioner. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2] Case Notes See also notes at end of this chapter. This article does not authorize a private cause of action. 795 F. Supp. 1036.
